name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-attendance-report-nodejs
title: Bot sent meeting attendance report in chat.
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates how to retrieve meeting attendance reports using the Graph API and send them through a bot in Microsoft Teams chat.
longDescription: This sample application allows users to obtain meeting attendance reports via the Graph API and automatically sends these reports through a bot when the meeting concludes. It features seamless integration with Microsoft Teams and enhances meeting management through automated reporting.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing meeting attendance report in chat node

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
